which has come <S%G3918><s%> to you; <S%G5209><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> it is in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is bearing fruit <S%G2592><s%> and growing, <S%G2531><s%> as it does in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> knew <S%G1921><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth; <S%G225><s%>

in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> our redemption, <S%G629><s%> the forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of our sins; <S%G266><s%>
who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the image <S%G1504><s%> of the invisible <S%G517><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> creation. <S%G2937><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are held together. <S%G4921><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of the body, <S%G4983><s%> the assembly, <S%G1577><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the beginning, <S%G746><s%> the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead; <S%G3498><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things he <S%G846><s%> might <S%G1096><s%> have the preeminence. <S%G4409><s%>
For <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the fullness <S%G4138><s%> was <S%G2730><s%> pleased <S%G2106><s%> to dwell <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him; <S%G846><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to reconcile <S%G604><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> himself, <S%G846><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> things <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the heavens, <S%G3772><s%> having made peace <S%G1517><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> cross. <S%G4716><s%>

yet now <S%G3570><s%> he has reconciled <S%G604><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> to present <S%G3936><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> without blemish <S%G299><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blameless <S%G410><s%> before <S%G2714><s%> him, <S%G846><s%>

if <S%G1489><s%> it is so that you continue in <S%G1961><s%> the faith, <S%G4102><s%> grounded <S%G2311><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> steadfast, <S%G1476><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> moved away <S%G3334><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of the Good News <S%G2098><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you heard, <S%G191><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is being proclaimed <S%G2784><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> creation <S%G2937><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> heaven; <S%G3772><s%> of which I, <S%G1473><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> a servant. <S%G1249><s%>

of which <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> a servant, <S%G1249><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the stewardship <S%G3622><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which was given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> to fulfill <S%G4137><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>

the mystery <S%G3466><s%> which has been hidden <S%G613><s%> for <S%G575><s%> ages <S%G165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> generations. <S%G1074><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> it has been revealed <S%G5319><s%> to <S%G40><s%> his <S%G846><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%>
